name: Farm RPG
description:
Farm RPG is a simple, text-based, mobile-friendly farming RPG / MMO game where you start a farm, plant crops, fish, craft and explore.

Features:
- No limit to playing, farm all day if you want!
- Mostly text-based to reduce data usage and plays fast
- No ads or annoying popups
- Exploring takes stamina, but refills pretty fast
- Solid community of friendly gamers
